recipes.label: Sharp Egos
recipes.startdescription: One of my followers has taken an especial satisfaction in their station, and moves quickly to gloat on their newfound status -

recipes.label: Sharp Egos
recipes.startdescription: One of my followers moves quickly to gloat on their newfound status -

recipes.label: Sharp Egos
recipes.startdescription: Pride, the beast that devours its brothers.

recipes.label: Recruit a new Follower?
recipes.startdescription: To recruit a follower, I will need a little of the power we revere. I might glean it from an Influence, or a Tool, or an Ingredient, or just the Lore of our tradition.

recipes.label: Nothing to say?
recipes.startdescription: 'I don't believe we have anything to say to each other.'

recipes.label: Recruit an Acquaintance?
recipes.startdescription: This one might be ready to achieve the next level, if I can supply something more.

recipes.label: Recruit an Acquaintance, by invoking Edge
recipes.startdescription: This one is ready.
recipes.description: Before they speak the words, the novice must sharpen a knife so it can separate a drifting thread. An it be not sharp enough, it will be the worse for them.

recipes.label: The Limits of Discretion
recipes.startdescription: To induct any additional members now would compromise my cult's ability to stay hidden. Until we learn to be more discreet, we cannot grow our ranks. [Upgrade your Cult Discretion card to allow more members into your cult.]

recipes.description: The ceremony requires a searing. Only a little one; but they will carry the mark all their life.

recipes.description: Only a little wound. Just enough to give homage to the powers that open.

recipes.label: Recruit an Acquaintance, by invoking Lantern
recipes.startdescription: This one is ready.
recipes.description: A dozen lights blaze. There is no place for shadow in these rites, and no place for mercy.

recipes.description: Moth sheds its skin. The novice must only shed their clothes, and their past.

recipes.label: Recruit an Acquaintance, by invoking Winter
recipes.startdescription: This one is ready.
recipes.description: I will speak only and exactly nine words. The novice will speak none at all.

recipes.label: Recruit an Acquaintance, by invoking Winter
recipes.startdescription: This one is ready.
recipes.description: I will speak only and exactly nine words. The novice will speak none at all.

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Edge
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'My scars are weapons. Through striving I rise to victory. There is no defeat but annihilation. In the light of the Bright Edge we know ourselves. I pledge myself to the service of the strongest.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Forge
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'I am destroyed. I am remade. Now I sear my skin, and by these marks shall I be known. I pledge myself to the flame, and I shall not flinch from any remaking.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Grail
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: In pain are we born. In hunger are we embraced. In delight are we devoured. These are the gates of the body, and this is Her promise: not all that is born decays. In remembrance of that promise, we give ourselves to the Feast.

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Heart
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'We cede our mouths to the thunder. We cede our feet to the dance. We cede our skins to the night. We do not cease; we do not cease; we do not cease.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Knock
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'To she who was flesh, I offer my wounds. To she who was stone, I offer this moment, where my old self divides from my new. To she who came from Light, I offer my secrets. The door is opened.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Lantern
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'He navigates. Now you are the map. He illuminates. You were the darkness. He is not compassionate. You will not show compassion. Our compass is Knowledge and our course is Glory.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Moth
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'Now the scissors, and then the knife. Now the wood, and then the bones. Now the flutter of the moon, and then the dappling of the soul. He was blood, and so will we be.'

recipes.label: Promote a Believer by invoking Winter
recipes.startdescription: My follower will kneel as a novice, and rise as an initiate. I will administer the necessary oaths myself.
recipes.description: 'Now you shed your blood, as the Sun's blood was shed. Now your past is divided from your future, as the Wolf was divided. You were not born. Your service ends only in dissolution. Arise, in silence.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to an Assassin
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'As the Lionsmith knelt to the Colonel, so now I kneel. My service ends in death, or in the resolution of strengths.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Reshaper
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'I am the hammer and the anvil; I am the fire's touch and the iron's blessing. I pledge myself to the final conflagration.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Cyprian
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'By the Copper and the Crow, by She for whom we Hunger and She who Hungers for us, I pledge myself to be the Feaster and the Feast. I will be devoured and I will devour.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Tarantellist
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'By the Pine and the Knife, by the Drum and the Circle, I pledge myself to lead the Dance that does not end. This is my service, but in the end, it is only the Dance that I serve. '

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Key
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'No lock remains. No door remains. No gate remains. No wall remains. No fortress is closed against me. No country forbids me. No law binds but the law of the Mother. I am a Key, and this is my use.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Seer
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'I pledge myself to light the way for the willing and for the unwilling. I pledge myself to navigate. I pledge myself to illuminate. I pledge myself against mercy. I will walk the path that is shown, no matter the price.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple to a Skintwister
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
recipes.description: 'This was my past, but now I am changed. These are my garments, which I set aside. Here is my skin, but it is loaned to me. Here is my name, which is only a blindfold. Here is the Wood, where we strangle the light. Here I was, and here I am not.'

recipes.label: Attempt to Exalt a Disciple
recipes.startdescription: Only a rare few - those most suited to service in our mysteries - may achieve this rank.
